faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions

items.question: How can I create an account?
items.answer: Click on the 'Login' button then 'Create account'. Follow the steps to register.

items.question: What are your rates?
items.answer: Our rates depend on your needs. Contact us for a personalized quote.

items.question: How does the platform work?
items.answer: Our platform centralizes the management of your real estate properties in one place.

items.question: Do you offer customer support?
items.answer: Yes, our support team is available Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm.
